name: Vacuum
description:
Elderly client who is looking for vacuum cleaner to help her clean her house. Her current vacuum cleaner has malfunctioned and hoped to get a working condition to replace his old one. She solely relies on financial assistance for her daily living, hence, purchasing a new one is not possible.

Hope doner can cover the delivery cost.

Thank you.

name: Television
description: The family of 5 consist of 2 adults and 3 children aged 9,5 & 2. Every evening, the elder son completing his school work, he watches some cartoon. Recently their TV breakdown and it is beyond repair condition. The father just managed to secure a logistics job on 21st Jan 2025 and mum is not working due to her health issues. Even the father takes his first salary this month after 21st 2025, he still unable to purchase a television immediately as they need to manage their monthly expenses. name: Geriatric Chair
description:
Mdm Chin is a 72 years old, single lady living alone. 

Mdm Chin has contracted rectum cancer which has spread to her bones, lungs and lymph node. 

The cancer spread to her pelvic bones and spine, which causes her to have immense pain sitting, standing and even the action of getting up is strenous for her.

Having a geriatric chair would ease her pain and be less straining for her to get up.

passiton.name: Geriatric chair, manual, height adjustable.
passiton.description: Clean, very usable Geri chair with table to be donated.
